name: User Login
backend_requirements: 1. User model: id, username (unique), password_hash, created_at
2. POST /api/auth/register - hash password with bcrypt, return success/error
3. POST /api/auth/login - verify credentials, return JWT token
4. GET /api/auth/me - return current user info from token
frontend_requirements: 1. Login form with username and password fields
2. Registration form with username, password, confirm password
5. Show error messages for invalid credentials
